li.p:
Input Voltage
@ 50 Hz: 415VAC or 380VAC
@ 60 Hz: 600, 480 or 208V

Output Voltage
@ 50 Hz: 575, 415/240, or 380/220V
@ 60 Hz: 600, 575, 480, or 208/120V
Output:
Neutral: computer grade neutrals for subfeeds and panelboards
200%-rated neutral busbars
173%-rated panelboard neutrals
Ground: Computer-grade single point safety ground
Isolated ground available as option
Emergency Power Off (EPO) button on front-mounted Color Monitor bezel
